## DidIonMethod.generateDwnOptions() method

Generates two key pairs used for authorization and encryption purposes when interfacing with DWNs. The IDs of these keys are referenced in the service object that includes the dwnUrls provided.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static generateDwnOptions(options: {
        encryptionKeyId?: string;
        serviceEndpointNodes: string[];
        serviceId?: string;
        signingKeyAlgorithm?: typeof SupportedCryptoAlgorithms[number];
        signingKeyId?: string;
    }): Promise<DidIonCreateOptions>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { encryptionKeyId?: string; serviceEndpointNodes: string\[\]; serviceId?: string; signingKeyAlgorithm?: typeof SupportedCryptoAlgorithms\[number\]; signingKeyId?: string; } |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[DidIonCreateOptions](./dids.didioncreateoptions.md)<!-- -->&gt;
